Interpretation: No significant effects observed for either gender.
Borderline decrease in male tobacco use from media campaigns. Counterintuitive increase in female tobacco use from ad bans.

Unexpected increase in female tobacco use from cessation support and risk warnings.
Risk warnings reduce tobacco use for both genders.
